name: Laboratory Employees Guild, Appellant, v. Trustees of the University of Pennsylvania
name_abbreviation: Laboratory Employees Guild v. Trustees of the University of Pennsylvania

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Ea-gen, O’Brien, Pomeroy, Nix and Manoeeino, JJ.
Mr. Justice Egberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Laboratory Employees Guild, Appellant, v. Trustees of the University of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
Opinion
per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellant.
Mr. Justice Egberts took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: per Curiam,

attorneys: David Cohen, with him Harry Lore, for appellant.
J. Freedley Hunsicker, Jr., with him Haywa,rd II. Cobu/rn, and Drinker, Biddle & Reath, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Laboratory Employees Guild, Appellant, v. Trustees of the University of Pennsylvania.
Argued. January 13, 1972.
Before Jones, C. J., Ea-gen, O’Brien, Pomeroy, Nix and Manoeeino, JJ.
reargument refused July 31, 1972,
David Cohen, with him Harry Lore, for appellant.
J. Freedley Hunsicker, Jr., with him Haywa,rd II. Cobu/rn, and Drinker, Biddle & Reath, for appellees.
June 28, 1972:
